description:
Situated in the highly desired suburb of Bridgeman Downs is this north facing lovely lowset brick family home set on a 661sqm block.

Entering via a covered portico, the home opens to the entry foyer which provides seamless access to the home. Directly opposite the entry is a carpeted formal lounge room or formal dining room with access to the outdoor undercover entertaining area. Central to the home, the open plan kitchen, living and dining. The tiled living room has a ceiling fan and access to the outdoor entertaining area. The kitchen has an electric cooktop, double basin, pantry and ample bench and storage space. Adjacent to the kitchen is the meals area with access to the outdoor undercover entertaining area.

To the left of the entry, the generous sized fully carpeted master bedroom with built ins, split system air conditioning, ceiling fan and an ensuite with a bathtub, shower, toilet, and single bay vanity with ample storage. At the back of the home, an additional three bedrooms, all with ceiling fans and two with built ins. Central to the bedrooms, a family bathroom with a bathtub, shower, single bay vanity with ample storage and separate toilet. There is also a separate laundry.

To further compliment this beautiful home, an outdoor undercover entertaining area and fully fenced backyard with ample space for kids or pets to play and a two-car automated garage with secure access to the home.

Approx. 14 kilometres to the Brisbane CBD and 25 minutes to Brisbane Airport via the Airport Link, the area is well serviced by private school bus services from some of Brisbane's best private schools. You are also within walking distance of local parks including Bangalow Street Park and Coolabah Crescent Park. Here you are also just 10 minutes by car to Westfield Chermside offering a plethora of retail, dining, and entertaining choices.

Key Features:
- Lounge room
- Living room with ceiling fan
- Dining room
- Kitchen with electric cooktop, pantry, good storage
- Master Bedroom with built ins, Ensuite, air conditioning & ceiling fan
- 2nd Bedroom with built ins & ceiling fan
- 3rd Bedroom with built ins & ceiling fan
- 4th Bedroom with ceiling fan
- Family bathroom

- Undercover outdoor entertaining area
- Grass area
- Fully fenced backyard
- 2 car accommodation
- Approx 661 sqm block

- Walking distance to park
- Close to shops
- Close to school
- Close to public transport
- Close to major shopping centres
